Oct. 9, 2011 D Oxfordshire & District Brass Band Association Entertainment Contest
Oxfordshire & District Brass Band Association Entertainment Contest (Section A) 20 Entertainments Contest Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest oxfordshire-district-brass-band-section-a
Burford School, Burford, Oxfordshire, England, UK Only one section was run due to a lack of entry numbers.
Best Soloist - Jordan Mason, Cornet Wantage "B" Best Entertainment/Presentation - A.W. Parker (Drybrook) Best Soprano Cornet - Glyn Kennett Witney Town Best Tenor Horn - Jenny Cobley Malvern Hills District Best Percussion - A.W. Parker (Drybrook) Best Conductor - Nigel Hall Malvern Hills District
Feb. 14, 2012, 11:45 a.m. Feb. 14, 2012, 11:51 a.m.
1 Wantage Concert Brass Danny Dullforce
